## Validation

## Architecture Change Checklist (complete only if architecture is affected)

- [ ] I changed system boundaries, runtime behavior, route contracts, or core config (`app/layout.tsx`, `app/api/*`, `data/config/*`, `next.config.js`)
- [ ] I updated `docs/architecture/README.md` and/or `docs/architecture/diagrams.md`
- [ ] I added or updated an ADR in `docs/architecture/adr/`
- [ ] I documented risks, trade-offs, and rollout/validation considerations
- [ ] I listed any follow-up tasks needed after merge
